title: Welcome to Storedog
content: Your one-stop shop for Datadog swag. From stickers to hoodies, we have everything you need to show your Bits pride. Free shipping on orders over $50.

title: About Storedog
content: Storedog is the official Datadog merchandise store. We carry exclusive Bits-themed stickers, apparel, and accessories for the Datadog community.

title: Shipping & Returns
content: We offer free standard shipping on all orders over $50. Standard shipping takes 3-5 business days. Express shipping is available for $12.99 and arrives in 1-2 business days. Returns are accepted within 30 days of purchase.
